Property.Name: Log Event ID
Property.Description: Event ID to trigger. This is equivelent to the base event ID + 0x100. See pause_screen.asm for log event lists. Log event ids should always be even.

Property.Name: Delay
Property.Description: Number of seconds to wait before triggering the event. If set to 0, the delay timer will not run. The even can always be triggered when Samus touched the PLM.

Property.Name: Notification
Property.Description: If set true, the HUD notification is triggered.
